tool_description: Api showing the best 40 songs in italy, includes title and artist
title: Radio Chart Italy

api_list.name: Get all chart of top songs titles and artists
api_list.description: this endpoint will return all the song titles and the artists of the top 40 songs of the moment in Italy.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://radio-chart-italy.p.rapidapi.com/chart"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "radio-chart-italy.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
